Sure, a big awards show looks like a lot of fun—the glamour, the glitz, the glut of celebrities!—but if you think about it, it doesn’t seem like the most . . . relaxing way to spend an evening. And, anyway, you can basically participate from your own home—and without a single dress fitting, constrictive shapewear, or truly uncomfortable shoes. One of the many benefits of being a mere mortal is the chance to enjoy all the red carpet fashion and behind-the-scenes moments from the comfort of your couch. Above, some of our favorite celebrity Instagram posts from the 2017 Golden Globes .
